橙斑翅柳鶯.definition: (bird species of China) buff-barred warbler (Phylloscopus pulcher)

橙翅噪鶥.definition: (bird species of China) Elliot's laughingthrush (Trochalopteron elliotii)

橙胸咬鵑.definition: (bird species of China) orange-breasted trogon (Harpactes oreskios)

橙胸姬鶲.definition: (bird species of China) rufous-gorgeted flycatcher (Ficedula strophiata)

橙胸綠鳩.definition: (bird species of China) orange-breasted green pigeon (Treron bicinctus)

橙腹葉鵯.definition: (bird species of China) orange-bellied leafbird (Chloropsis hardwickii)

橙頭地鶇.definition: (bird species of China) orange-headed thrush (Geokichla citrina)

橙黃.definition: orange yellow; tangerine yellow; chrome yellow
